# A trusted resource for learning phage research technique

  Open Phage aims to provide developing scientists from around the world a trusted resource for learning new phage-handling and research techniques, built by your friends at Phages for Global Health and Phage Directory.

  

  ### Coming in December, 2020.

content.value: A trusted resource for learning phage research technique

title: A trusted resource for learning phage research technique

markdown: # A trusted resource for learning phage research technique

content.value: Open Phage aims to provide developing scientists from around the world a trusted resource for learning new phage-handling and research techniques, built by your friends at Phages for Global Health and Phage Directory.

title: Open Phage aims to provide developing scientists from around the world a trusted resource for learning new phage-handling and research techniques, built by your friends at Phages for Global Health and Phage Directory.

markdown: Open Phage aims to provide developing scientists from around the world a trusted resource for learning new phage-handling and research techniques, built by your friends at Phages for Global Health and Phage Directory.

## A joint mission towards the pursuit of deeper phage knowledge

  Open Phage is a joint project between [Phages for Global Health](https://phagesforglobalhealth.org) and [Phage Directory](https://phage.directory). Our mission is to provide resources for researchers and microbiology labs from all backgrounds to develop capabilities to work with bacteriophages.

markdown: Open Phage is a joint project between [Phages for Global Health](https://phagesforglobalhealth.org) and [Phage Directory](https://phage.directory). Our mission is to provide resources for researchers and microbiology labs from all backgrounds to develop capabilities to work with bacteriophages.

## Get live training with experienced phage researchers

  We can help get your lab up to speed with phage research, either via remote or via in-person training. from our experienced roster of researchers. If interested, please contact us at [live@openphage.org](mailto:live@openphage.org)

markdown: We can help get your lab up to speed with phage research, either via remote or via in-person training. from our experienced roster of researchers. If interested, please contact us at [live@openphage.org](mailto:live@openphage.org)

**Phages for Global Health trains phage researchers and facilitates the application of antibacterial phage technology in the developing world** Phages for Global Health description here. **Phage Directory helps you go farther and deeper with your phage research** Phage Directory provides the research tools and the community for you to accelerate your phage research. We help you keep track of and access phages from both inside your lab and from around the world. Connect with phage researchers from around the world to swap both phages and phage knowledge.

## Get in touch

  If you have any questions about what we do, please visit our individual organizations, [Phages for Global Health](https://phagesforglobalhealth.org) and [Phage Directory](https://phage.directory)

  If you have any questions about our lecture materials, want to schedule an in-person training session for your institution, please don't hesitate to reach out at [hello@openphage.org](mailto:hello@openphage.org)

  If you have technical or support questions, or if you'd like to report a bug, please contact [support@openphage.org](mailto:support@openphage.org)

markdown:
# A trusted resource for learning phage research technique

  Open Phage aims to provide developing scientists from around the world a trusted resource for learning new phage-handling and research techniques, built by your friends at Phages for Global Health and Phage Directory.

  

  ### Coming in December, 2020.

title: A trusted resource for learning phage research technique

markdown: Open Phage aims to provide developing scientists from around the world a trusted resource for learning new phage-handling and research techniques, built by your friends at Phages for Global Health and Phage Directory.

## A joint mission towards the pursuit of deeper phage knowledge

  Open Phage is a joint project between [Phages for Global Health](https://phagesforglobalhealth.org) and [Phage Directory](https://phage.directory). Our mission is to provide resources for researchers and microbiology labs from all backgrounds to develop capabilities to work with bacteriophages.

content.value: A joint mission towards the pursuit of deeper phage knowledge

title: A joint mission towards the pursuit of deeper phage knowledge

. Our mission is to provide resources for researchers and microbiology labs from all backgrounds to develop capabilities to work with bacteriophages.

markdown: Open Phage is a joint project between [Phages for Global Health](https://phagesforglobalhealth.org) and [Phage Directory](https://phage.directory). Our mission is to provide resources for researchers and microbiology labs from all backgrounds to develop capabilities to work with bacteriophages.

## Get live training with experienced phage researchers

  We can help get your lab up to speed with phage research, either via remote or via in-person training. from our experienced roster of researchers. If interested, please contact us at [live@openphage.org](mailto:live@openphage.org)

**Phages for Global Health trains phage researchers and facilitates the application of antibacterial phage technology in the developing world** Phages for Global Health description here. **Phage Directory helps you go farther and deeper with your phage research** Phage Directory provides the research tools and the community for you to accelerate your phage research. We help you keep track of and access phages from both inside your lab and from around the world. Connect with phage researchers from around the world to swap both phages and phage knowledge.

## Get in touch

  If you have any questions about what we do, please visit our individual organizations, [Phages for Global Health](https://phagesforglobalhealth.org) and [Phage Directory](https://phage.directory)

  If you have any questions about our lecture materials, want to schedule an in-person training session for your institution, please don't hesitate to reach out at [hello@openphage.org](mailto:hello@openphage.org)

  If you have technical or support questions, or if you'd like to report a bug, please contact [support@openphage.org](mailto:support@openphage.org)
